mapper.update: UPDATE ht_borrow b SET b.borrow_account_yes = b.borrow_account_yes + #{borrowAccountYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, b.borrow_account_wait = b.borrow_account_wait - #{borrowAccountYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, b.borrow_service = CAST( ( CAST( CASE WHEN b.borrow_service IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE b.borrow_service END AS DECIMAL(65,2) ) + #{borrowService,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ) AS CHAR), b.borrow_account_scale =TRUNCATE((b.borrow_account_yes/b.account)*100,2), b.tender_times = b.tender_times + 1 WHERE b.id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE ht_borrow b SET b.borrow_full_status = 1, b.`status` = 3, b.borrow_full_time = unix_timestamp(now()) WHERE b.id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END AS borrow_period, CONCAT(b.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, bs.`name` AS borrow_style, b.service_fee_rate registname, bi.borrow_extra_yield, bi.remark, IFNULL(label.label_name, '--') AS labelName, DATE_FORMAT(b.regist_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') AS regist_time, CONCAT(b.borrow_account_scale, '%') borrow_account_scale, b.`status` AS `status`, b.create_time as addtime, b.verify_over_time AS verify_over_time, CASE WHEN ontime <> 0 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.ontime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS ontime, CASE WHEN verify_time IS NOT NULL AND verify_time != '0' THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS verify_time, CASE WHEN verify_time IS NOT NULL AND verify_time THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.borrow_full_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS borrow_full_time, CASE WHEN reverify_time <> 0 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.reverify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS reverify_time, CASE WHEN recover_last_time <> 0 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.recover_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS recover_last_time, CASE WHEN repay_last_time <> 0 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ELSE '' END AS repay_last_time, b.plan_nid, hic.inst_name, CASE WHEN bi.company_or_personal=2 THEN hbm.name WHEN bi.company_or_personal=1 THEN hbu.username ELSE '' END AS borrower_name,
CASE WHEN bi.company_or_personal=2 THEN hbm.city WHEN bi.company_or_personal=1 THEN '' ELSE '' END AS location,
CASE WHEN bi.company_or_personal=2 THEN '个人' WHEN bi.company_or_personal=1 THEN '企业' ELSE '' END AS attribute FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi on b.borrow_nid=bi.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_label label ON b.label_id = label.id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = b.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = bi.inst_code LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_user hbu ON hbu.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_maninfo hbm ON hbm.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid
ORDER BY b.create_time DESC, b.id DESC

SELECT borrow.id, borrow.borrow_nid, borrow.project_type, borrow.user_id, borrow.borrow_user_name, borrow.status, borrow.account, borrow.borrow_valid_time, borrow.borrow_style, borrow.borrow_period, borrow.borrow_apr, borrow.label_id, borrow.is_show, borrow.is_engine_used, borrow.is_installment, borrow.is_month, borrow.regist_status, borrow.regist_time, borrow.regist_user_id, borrow.regist_user_name, borrow.verify_status, borrow.verify_over_time, borrow.verify_time, borrow.verify_userid, borrow.verify_user_name, borrow.verify_remark, borrow.verify_contents, borrow_status, ontime, borrow_end_time, plan_nid, borrow_full_status, borrow_full_time, borrow.tender_times, borrow.borrow_account_yes, borrow.borrow_account_wait, borrow.borrow_account_scale, borrow.borrow_service, borrow.reverify_status, borrow.reverify_time, borrow.reverify_userid, borrow.reverify_user_name, borrow.reverify_remark, borrow.reverify_contents, borrow.recover_last_time, borrow.repay_last_time, borrow.repay_next_time, borrow.repay_status, borrow.repay_full_status, borrow.repay_fee_normal, borrow.repay_account_all, borrow.repay_account_interest, borrow.repay_account_capital, borrow.repay_account_yes, borrow.repay_account_interest_yes, borrow.repay_account_capital_yes, borrow.repay_account_wait, borrow.repay_account_interest_wait, borrow.repay_account_capital_wait, borrow.borrow_manager, borrow.service_fee_rate, borrow.manage_fee_rate, borrow.differential_rate, borrow.late_interest_rate, borrow.late_free_days, borrow.create_user_name, borrow.add_ip, borrow.create_time, borrow.updatetime, borrow.increase_interest_flag FROM ht_borrow borrow LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info info ON borrow.borrow_nid = info.borrow_nid

SELECT bi.borrow_increase_money increase_money, truncate(bi.tender_account_min/10000,2) tender_account_min_wan, bi.contract_period, bi.borrow_extra_yield, bi.borrow_asset_number, bi.borrow_publisher, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN '天' ELSE '个月' END AS borrow_period_type, b.borrow_nid, bi.`name` AS borrow_name, bi.project_name, bi.applicant, b.borrow_user_name AS username, b.user_id AS userId, FORMAT(b.account, 2) AS account, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_yes, 2) AS borrow_account_yes, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_wait, 2) AS borrow_account_wait, CONCAT(b.borrow_account_scale, '%') borrow_account_scale, b.borrow_style, bs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, b.project_type, bpt.borrow_name AS project_type_name, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, CONCAT(b.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, FROM_UNIXTIME( b.reverify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS reverify_time, CASE WHEN ( ( b.`status` = 0 ) OR ( b.`status` = 0 AND b.verify_status = 0 ) ) THEN '初审中' WHEN ( ( b.`status` = 0 AND ( b.verify_status = 1 OR b.verify_status = 3 )) ) THEN '待发布' WHEN ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.borrow_status = 1 AND b.borrow_account_yes < b.account AND b.verify_time + ( b.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW() ) ) THEN '出借中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.reverify_time = '0' AND ( ( b.reverify_status = 0 AND b.borrow_account_yes >= b.account ) OR ( b.verify_time + ( b.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) ) ) THEN '复审中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 0 ) THEN '还款中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 1 ) THEN '已还款' WHEN b.`status` = 2 THEN '已流标' ELSE '' END AS `status`, FROM_UNIXTIME( b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS addtime, CASE WHEN b.borrow_full_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.borrow_full_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS borrow_full_time, CASE WHEN b.recover_last_time <> 0 AND b.recover_last_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.recover_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS recover_last_time, CASE WHEN b.recover_last_time <> 0 AND b.recover_last_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.recover_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ELSE '' END AS recover_last_day FROM ht_borrow b
LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = b.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi on bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid where 1=1
AND b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNidSrch}
AND bi.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{borrowNameSrch}, '%')
AND b.borrow_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{usernameSrch}, '%')
AND ( ( b.`status` = 0 ) OR ( b.`status` = 0 AND b.verify_status = 0 ) )
AND ( ( b.`status` = 0 AND ( b.verify_status = 1 OR b.verify_status = 3 ) ) )
AND ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.borrow_status = 1 AND b.borrow_account_yes < b.account AND b.verify_time + ( borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW() ) )
AND ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.reverify_time = '0' AND ( ( b.reverify_status = 0 AND b.borrow_account_yes >= b.account ) OR ( b.verify_time + ( borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) ) )
AND ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 0 )
AND ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 1 )
AND b.`status` = 2
AND b.borrow_period = #{borrowPeriod}
AND b.project_type = #{projectTypeSrch}
AND b.borrow_style = #{borrowStyleSrch}
AND b.recover_last_time >= unix_timestamp(#{recoverTimeStartSrch})
AND b.recover_last_time <= unix_timestamp(#{recoverTimeEndSrch})+86399
AND b.create_time >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND b.create_time <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})+86399
ORDER BY
${col} ${sort},
b.create_time DESC, b.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT hdi.id, hdi.user_id, hdi.order_id, IFNULL(hydu.truename,'') AS real_name, hydu.username, -- hydui.idcard, '' as idcard,
SUBSTRING(FORMAT(hdi.account,4),1,LENGTH(FORMAT(hdi.account,4))-2) AS account,
CASE WHEN hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hydb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT( hydb.borrow_period, '个月' ) END AS invest_period, hydb.borrow_apr AS interest, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS invest_start_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS invest_end_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS invest_start_day, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS invest_end_day, hydbs.nid AS method_nid, hydbs.`name` AS repay_method, hdi.repay_account AS total FROM ht_debt_invest hdi INNER JOIN ht_debt_borrow hydb ON hydb.borrow_nid = hdi.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_style hydbs ON hydb.borrow_style = hydbs.nid INNER JOIN ht_r_user hydu ON hydu.user_id = hdi.user_id
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(hydbrp.id) FROM ht_debt_loan_detail hydbrp

SELECT hydat.id, hydu.truename AS real_name, hydu.username, hydat.recover_account_interest, '' idcard,
SUBSTRING(FORMAT(hydat.account,4),1,LENGTH(FORMAT(hydat.account,4))-2) AS account,
CASE WHEN hydb.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hydb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT( hydb.borrow_period, '个月' ) END AS invest_period, hydb.borrow_apr AS interest, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS invest_start_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS invest_end_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS invest_start_day, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydb.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS invest_end_day, hydbs.nid AS method_nid, hydbs.`name` AS repay_method, hydat.recover_account_all AS total, hydat.nid, hydat.user_id FROM ht_borrow_tender hydat INNER JOIN ht_borrow hydb ON hydb.borrow_nid = hydat.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_style hydbs ON hydb.borrow_style = hydbs.nid INNER JOIN ht_r_user hydu ON hydu.user_id = hydat.user_id
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(hydbrp.id) FROM ht_borrow_recover_plan hydbrp

SELECT bi.borrow_increase_money increase_money, truncate(bi.tender_account_min/10000,2) tender_account_min_wan, bi.contract_period, bi.borrow_extra_yield, bi.borrow_asset_number, bi.borrow_publisher, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN '天' ELSE '个月' END AS borrow_period_type, b.borrow_nid, bi.`name` AS borrow_name, bi.project_name, bi.applicant, b.borrow_user_name AS username, b.user_id AS userId, FORMAT(b.account, 2) AS account, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_yes, 2) AS borrow_account_yes, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_wait, 2) AS borrow_account_wait, CONCAT(b.borrow_account_scale, '%') borrow_account_scale, b.borrow_style, bs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, b.project_type, bpt.borrow_name AS project_type_name, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, CONCAT(b.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, FROM_UNIXTIME( b.reverify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS reverify_time, CASE WHEN ( ( b.`status` = 0 ) OR ( b.`status` = 0 AND b.verify_status = 0 ) ) THEN '初审中' WHEN ( ( b.`status` = 0 AND ( b.verify_status = 1 OR b.verify_status = 3 ) ) ) THEN '待发布' WHEN ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.borrow_status = 1 AND b.borrow_account_yes < b.account AND b.verify_time + ( b.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW() ) ) THEN '出借中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.reverify_time = '0' AND ( ( b.reverify_status = 0 AND b.borrow_account_yes >= b.account ) OR ( b.verify_time + ( b.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) ) ) THEN '复审中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 0 ) THEN '还款中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 1 ) THEN '已还款' WHEN b.`status` = 2 THEN '已流标' ELSE '' END AS `status`, FROM_UNIXTIME( b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS addtime, CASE WHEN b.borrow_full_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.borrow_full_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS borrow_full_time, CASE WHEN b.recover_last_time <> 0 AND b.recover_last_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.recover_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS recover_last_time, CASE WHEN b.recover_last_time <> 0 AND b.recover_last_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.recover_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ELSE '' END AS recover_last_day FROM ht_borrow b
LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = b.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi on bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid where 1=1
AND b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNidSrch}
AND bi.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{borrowNameSrch}, '%')
AND b.borrow_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{usernameSrch}, '%')
AND ( ( b.`status` = 0 ) OR ( b.`status` = 0 AND b.verify_status = 0 ) )
AND ( ( b.`status` = 0 AND ( b.verify_status = 1 OR b.verify_status = 3 ) ) )
AND ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.borrow_status = 1 AND b.borrow_account_yes < b.account AND b.verify_time + ( borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW() ) )
AND ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.reverify_time = '0' AND ( ( b.reverify_status = 0 AND b.borrow_account_yes >= b.account ) OR ( b.verify_time + ( borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) ) )
AND ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 0 )
AND ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 1 )
AND b.`status` = 2
AND b.borrow_period = #{borrowPeriod}
AND b.project_type = #{projectTypeSrch}
AND b.borrow_style = #{borrowStyleSrch}
AND b.recover_last_time >= unix_timestamp(#{recoverTimeStartSrch})
AND b.recover_last_time <= unix_timestamp(#{recoverTimeEndSrch})+86399
AND b.create_time >= unix_timestamp(#{timeStartSrch})
AND b.create_time <= unix_timestamp(#{timeEndSrch})+86399
ORDER BY
${col} ${sort},
b.create_time DESC, b.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
mapper.update: UPDATE ht_borrow hb SET hb.borrow_manager = cast(IFNULL(hb.borrow_manager,0) as decimal(11,2)) + #{repayFeeNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hb.repay_account_yes = IFNULL(hb.repay_account_yes,0) + #{repayAccountYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hb.repay_account_interest_yes = IFNULL(hb.repay_account_interest_yes,0) + #{repayAccountInterestYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hb.repay_account_capital_yes = IFNULL(hb.repay_account_capital_yes,0) + #{repayAccountCapitalYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hb.repay_account_wait = IFNULL(hb.repay_account_wait,0) - #{repayAccountWait,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hb.repay_account_interest_wait = IFNULL(hb.repay_account_interest_wait,0) - #{repayAccountInterestWait,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hb.repay_account_capital_wait = IFNULL(hb.repay_account_capital_wait,0) - #{repayAccountCapitalWait,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hb.repay_fee_normal = IFNULL(hb.repay_fee_normal,0) + #{repayFeeNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE hb.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
